name: Macy Mae's Eating Adventure
description:
A classic arcade style game where you play as Macy Mae, the toughest fat-cat around as she eaters here way through hedge mazes lined with cat food and haunted by will-o-wisps.  Eat the cans of salmon to power up, or snack on birds and rodents for bonus points.  Yes, its basically a shameless clone, but not an exact one -- the maps and assets are all original.

To play: press [Enter] to start, move using arrow keys or wasd, [Pause] to pause / un-pause the game, and [Escape] (or standard window controls) to exit the game.

This requires Java 7 or newer.
